However, there are no direct mentions of Agentic Engineering or its philosophical tenets. While developer growth and continuous feedback are discussed, they are presented in the context of skills training, rather than as deliberate engineering design to maximise agency. Lacking are references to system observability, AI integration, decentralised decision-making, or explicit agentic practices. The intended audience overlaps somewhat with Agentic Engineering (practitioners, scrum masters, and managers), yet the alignment is incidental rather than purposeful. The material is mostly promotional, with relatively little in-depth exploration of agency maximisation or engineering philosophies tied to the category.
